org.interpss.numeric.sparse

Interface ISparseEqnMatrix2x2

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISparseEqnObject<Matrix_xy,Vector_xy>, ISparseEquation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SparseEqnMatrix2x2Impl

    public interface ISparseEqnMatrix2x2
extends ISparseEqnObject<Matrix_xy,Vector_xy>
    Sparse Equation of data type 2x2 matrix for solving the [A]X=B problem. To outside, the index number is from 0 to n-1

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.interpss.numeric.sparse.base.ISparseEquation
